extendedInfo.description: Tracks your current level of caffeine.  Simply record each drink you consume.  Accounts for the natural metabolism of the caffeine in eachdrink over time.Available only in pay version:* Charts! * Ad free! * Improved drink input * Editable drinks * New Chart!  Level History and Projection chart will graph your caffeine level from a day in the past to a day into the future.Feel free to rate as you see fit, but please suggest features and bug fixes via email to:rogan.software@gmail.comThanks!  Features: * Set your desired caffeine zone with notifications! * Share to Facebook, Twitter, ... * Display drink sizes in oz. or ml. * Add custom drinks * Caffeine metabolism algorithm takes into account factors such as: weight, pregnancy, and use of oral contraceptives.

reviews.title: Needs a widget!
reviews.comment: Helps to keep caffeine level optimum when working and before going to sleep. A widget would be more than welcome however, since it would be much more convenient to see the current caffeine level straight from the home screen.
reviews.author: Jesse J\303\244rvinen

reviews.title: The logical measuring system
reviews.comment: Good app. Would be 5 stars if their was an option to use the metric system.
reviews.author: Koby Anderson

reviews.title: Does what it says, and does it pretty well
reviews.comment: The charts are a great upgrade from the Lite version. It\'s nice to see what my projected caffeine level is now, and what it would be later if I drank something now.   Would be nice if it could import the data from the Lite version, though. The tracking stuff doesn\'t have much use for a day or so without it.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Fairly good
reviews.comment: Great idea for an app, only problem I\'ve found is in reading the level that you\'ll be at at a certain time, because the scale down the bottom is so small and increases in 4 hour increments. 5 stars if you added vertical gridlines on the chart. Cheers.
reviews.author: Kyle Wilson

reviews.title: Working but...
reviews.comment: ...you need to find out yourself the information about caffeine eg. what\'s the optimal level before unwanted side effects.  Graphs could have default/customizable information lines that you could activate, like \"get your caffeine level this low before 22:00\" or \"Shake hands time!\" or \"Blood pressure high enough for you?\". Not as an encouragement but so that you could try to avoid those caffeine levels.  Finnish cup of coffee has about 0,9mg/ml so I tried to edit the standard Coffee -drink from the drink menu. I found out that there\'s no editing option so I had to just make new one and delete the old one.  Also have you considered the fact that caffeine probably takes also time to get in to your system? You could think adding an little side option for \"condensation\" notifications. It would be cool if my phone reminded me to drink more water, not just less coffee. :D   You have and great app going on here, I hope you have the time to develop it more inviting and user friendly!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Notifications annoying
reviews.comment: I have turned them off but still they occur..
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Not great
reviews.comment: This isn\'t what I was hoping for. I really wanted an Android version of Caffeine Zone, but this is a poor substitute.  The graph doesn\'t show your max and min levels, like I had hoped.  Graphically, it\'s awful too. Quite disappointed really.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Nearly there
reviews.comment: I\'d really like to be notified if I\'m about to drink something that would interfere with my sleep. A fresh Holo-themed interface wouldn\'t hurt, either. :)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Fantastic!
reviews.comment: Reviewers who give poor marks for lack of menu items haven\'t bothered to read very good instructions on adding your own.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Disappointing
reviews.comment: Graph doesn\'t show upper or lower levels, making it fairly pointless.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Cool tracker
reviews.comment: needs the ability to delete past entries. needs to show bands of target levels... High medium low. Just the graph by itself isn\'t so useful.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Excellent app!
reviews.comment: Super fast response from developer, and app does what\'s on the label.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: @jaloma, @benjamin - menu->Manage drinks
reviews.comment: @benjamin - menu->Manage drinks - Screens for adding, removing, editing your drink types.  Add as many custom energy drinks as you like! @jaloma - Customize your drink list completely.  Metric body weight units coming.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Loving it so far
reviews.comment: I\'m loving the app so far. I had an idea for a feature, and wrote the developer.  Twenty minutes later, I hear from the developer that my idea will be implemented. Great work!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Slow updates
reviews.comment: Looking over the dates of most of the comments the author doesn\'t appear to be overly active in adding new features. Wasn\'t much development throughout 2010/11  Hope to see more regular updates this year.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Awesome!
reviews.comment: Does exactly what I wanted. The graph helps me plan when to stop drinking coffee to sleep.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great!
reviews.comment: I currently drink crazy amounts and wanted to cut down so i wouldn\'t get headaches if I didn\'t have a coffee in few hours rather than go cold turkey
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Cool!
reviews.comment: It let\'s you post your caffeine intake to facebook - finally an app that does that! Lol! It\'s quite an interesting app though, I like it :)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great application.
reviews.comment: The developer is extremely-fast to respond to feedback(in my experience) and the application works very well. Great value!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: No energy drinks?
reviews.comment: There is no energy drink option or custom option to enter in another type of item w/ caffine in it. I regert spending a dollar, hopefully the next update includes more options.
reviews.author: A Google User
